Tool

NameTopographic Position Index (TPI)
ID18
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2011
Specificationgrid

Description

Topographic Position Index (TPI) calculation as proposed by Guisan et al. (1999). This is literally the same as the difference to the mean calculation (residual analysis) proposed by Wilson & Gallant (2000). The bandwidth parameter for distance weighting is given as percentage of the (outer) radius. References: - Guisan, A., Weiss, S.B., Weiss, A.D. (1999): GLM versus CCA spatial modeling of plant species distribution. Plant Ecology 143: 107-122. - Weiss, A.D. (2000): Topographic Position and Landforms Analysis. poster. - Wilson, J.P. & Gallant, J.C. (2000): Terrain Analysis - Principles and Applications.
